content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 the adore tee is your new favourite go-to for everyday wear simple stylish and super comfy made with soft and breathable *stylecraft love you* yarn a lovely cotton-acrylic blend it s perfect for spring and summer this easy-to-make top features a relaxed fit gentle drape and a subtle texture that s beginner-friendly but still fun to crochet worked flat in two panels with minimal shaping the adore tee is designed for comfort and ease whether you re throwing it on over jeans or layering it with a skirt it s a piece you ll reach for again and again this pattern includes step-by-step instructions a stitch guide size chart and video tutorial to help you every step of the way **features ** * easy-to-follow written pattern * lightweight and breathable aran cotton blend * relaxed fit with a soft drape * includes video tutorial 1 * beginner-friendly **sizes included ** xs to 3xl **suggested yarn ** stylecraft love you aran 60% cotton 40% acrylic **hook size ** 5 0 mm h-8 **skill level ** easy whether you re making your very first garment or just want something soothing and quick to stitch up the adore tee is a joy to make and wear **come join the community ** we d love to see your version of the adore tee join the lullaby lodge ravelry group 2 to share your projects chat with fellow makers ask questions and get sneak peeks at upcoming designs interested in testing patterns that s where we post our calls too come be part of the fun 1 https //youtu be/tqfo7ujqc48 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/lullaby-lodge-designs---ravelry-community-group
